metadata.Title: CVE-2019-2182 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In the Android kernel in the kernel MMU code there is a possible executionpath leaving some kernel text and rodata pages writable. This could lead tolocal escalation of privilege with no additional execution privilegesneeded. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
